text: Sakuya, how's the training camp going?

Oh, Producer.
I'm having a great time, of course.

That's good to hear... Since it's a joint camp,
I thought it might be tough with everything being different.

Not at all. There are new discoveries,
and it's very meaningful.

Even so, are you still worried about me?
It's true that the lessons are different from usual...

Living together in the large room...
It's like becoming a big family, it feels refreshing.

I see, if it's providing good stimulation, then that's great.
But if you encounter any problems, let me know.

No... I just feel like
I've become the father of a big family.
